name: Super Dramatic Flash Minigolf RPG
description:
Made as a solo project using Flash + Flixel in 2014, Super Dramatic Flash Minigolf RPG (SDMRPG) takes the drama and tragedy of minigolf to a new level. 

SDMRPG's gameplay is a twist on the minigolf formula - your aim is to knock enemies into hazards, and on their turn they will attempt to return the favor in kind.
